trends: There has been one other sighting in Fawn Grove
There were no other sightings in Fawn Grove on or around November 23rd 2008
Summary: Black triangle with three lights hovered in the sky
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking my dog for the evening and gazing up to enjoy the night sky when I noticed a trio of lights hanging in the sky in a perfectly even triangle. Faint light, almost bluish, seemed to come from the sides of the object. For the few minutes I was outside, the object made no sound or movement, but hung visibly in the sky, below the clouds when they were on occasion blown through. As I looked at it, I felt only disbelief. Obviously I was seeing something else. But there were no strobe lights to indicate a standard man-made aircraft, and it hung in the sky, too low to be stars or a a reflection on clouds, and too high to be part of some terrestrial structure. I went inside to put the dog away and note the time. When I came back outside to look at the object, I could no longer find it. The next day I went out at the same time, hoping to see the object again and confirm that it was a natural celestial event. The three lights did not appear, nor was I able to find the bluish light that seemed to come from its sides. I was, however, able to locate the nearby star patterns that I had used to note its location in the sky.
